report.title: 9,10, Never Sleep Again
report.author: Calahan
report.bodytext: INTRODUCTION /n /n Description of subject, the writer. /n /n Subject: Male, age 30'ish, weight 80kg, height 1.78cm /n Health: Good physical health, hayfever, asthma. /n Mental: Diagnosed ADHD-PI /n Medication taken two days earlier: 100mg valium, 8mg xanax. /n Medication taken same day: 10mg Lexapro, bronchodilator, antihistamine. /n /n Harm-reduction disclaimer /n ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ /n I felt obliged to note the excessive intake of valium and xanax I took two days earlier since half-life of benzos can be quite long and I don't know if it affects MDPV. /n /n Now for the MDPV, this is really important to take note of. I have read lots of reports of inability to stop redosing MDPV, fiendish! Be warned that this seems to be the standard with MDPV and a harsh come-down. /n /n However I did not at any time feel any urge to redose at any time after initial dose. Neither did I experience any comedown or crash, instead just such a slow comedown to baseline I didn't notice it. Whether it was depending on the combination of Lexapro, my mood and mindset or setting, further trials will tell if any. /n /n ============================================================================== /n /n Description of situation before intake of substance: /n /n Mindset: Just home from weekend at countryside house. Peaceful and curious. /n Setting: Home alone. I have had a full nights sleep and fully rested, and in a neutral mood and had a medium meal at 15 o clock. /n /n ------------------------------------------- /n /n The text is written in real-time, and I tried to edit as little as possible to show the change of mind and whatever. However I had to edit away rather large stories as my mind wandered to other things in this same document as sleepyness and focus on the report was lost. /n /n Description of the substance /n ---------------------------- /n Container is ca 3x2 inch ziplock brand RIPPIE, with a white label. Label has black text MPDV 500mg left side, and to right black square marking with three smaller squares upper left, lower left, upper right. /n /n The contents are a white salt, a bit chunky. Smells faintly citrus. Taste is chemical but not nasty. It solves in water with some effort. Snorting it is painless. /n /n Description and timeline of the MDPV /n ------------------------------------ /n /n 18.00 30mg of MDPV is taken nasal and 30mg MDPV orally solved in water. /n Unknown amount of snuff tobacco is consumed. /n /n 18:05 Non-placebo obscure active substance in bloodstream. /n /n 18:15 A weak stimulating body and head buzz. /n /n 18:30 Negatives: /n Minor jaw-tension. /n Involuntary movement of tounge and lips when not focusing. /n This would be a chewing gum moment in social setting. /n Increased pulse. /n Hands tremble a bit, though barely noticable. /n Tiny tactile and balance loss, which I suppose would go unnoticed. /n /n 18:40 Bodyload a chilled out stoned stimulation. /n Thoughts and memory becoming light, mindfulness and peace. /n /n 18:50 Eyes are still like baseline, there is zero dilation of pupils. /n Above mentioned side-effects remain. /n Positive effects have remained a plateau since 18:30. /n /n 19:00 Breathing has grown a bit more shallow but no issue. /n THe head sensations has spread, and is felt all over head, /n primarily at frontal cortex and temples. /n /n 19:20 What is not: /n Speed, activation, euphoria, cns-stimulation, sexual arrousal, /n social enhancement, ego-boost, and hyperactivity. /n /n What is: /n Relaxation, a calm mix of stony body/mind stimulation, mindfulness. /n The content of being is a sanctuary from impressions. /n Everything just is but no name for any of that. /n Release of naming, release of words and knowledge of anything. /n The mind feels a bit like how I imagine being 2-3 years old. /n /n /n 19:30 Taking a pause for now in noting. /n I lie down in sofa and enjoy listening to the wind from the window. put on Beethoven's seventh, which I normally can't listen because the beauty overwhelms me. /n How will it affect me now? /n /n 20:00 The music is passing through me without many emotions. /n Music appreciation is not heightened, but rather disturbing my bliss. /n but it activates me for what to do next. /n /n 21:00 I am now having a discussion on the net with a friend. /n She tell me I am writing a lot and inspired. /n I have no problem of changing subject and being apprehensive of her, /n but only after she mentioned my intense writing. /n This means I am entering a speedy phase of mind certainly although /n I didn't notice. Now the bodyload has lessened also. /n /n 21:30 Activation and speedy mind now. Communicating is important. /n Keeping focus on writing this report is decreased. /n Interesting note, I am feeling a betterment in my ADHD. /n I can focus better, switch focus between things without stress, /n and I do not feel the constant wornout mental feeling. /n /n 22:20 I am listening to Shakti. The speediness has lessened to a more /n normal state. I feel normal actually. /n Mentally I feel somewhat like when I were on Ritalin without /n the nasty nausea I would get from it. /n I am not feeling any urge to redose which is odd, considering this /n has been reported. /n I have yet to experience any comedown and what it is like. /n I am very hesitant to say this is good for ADHD even though I /n presently get this feeling - I know it is only a temporary high. /n The problem is firstly the effect now is different from 2 hours ago. /n Now the bodyload has disappeared and feeling rather sleepy peripherally. Head is still stimulated but in a less speedy way. In a almost natural awakened way, if I may say so since I don't know how it is for normal people. I feel awake now, but thoughts are not racing. /n /n 23:00 I have got some rather good things done during the evening. /n I wrote a poster with reminders for making budget which is a constant /n problem for me, and also a mental reminder how to handle medications /n and drugs in a way which works for me to not get addicted or abusing. /n Posted it on the wall for everyday reading in the morning. /n /n /n 01:50 A very creative state of mind during the last three hours. /n Loosing attention for this writing and enjoying texting online with /n friends. I got a very clear mind for expressing some important issues /n with a person who I found share some different experiences of reality /n which is very lonely to have nobody share with. I appreciated it very /n much. Focus is lost for writing more on the report in realtime, I am /n enjoying texting with friends and my stoned attention is still /n spinning with many ideas. Bodyload is gone and just tiredness. /n /n 05:00 Oh well, very sleepy.. The last six hours just passed like a breeze, /n can't believe it. Still having a alert head, but sleepy body. /n This is sure a long acting substance. /n /n 06:00 Back to baseline I think. What is now is the beyond sleepyness where I can get a false wakeful alertness, and refuse to go to bed although I know I would fall asleep in minutes and really need it and instead doing obsessive compulsive things. I am wary of going into a trance-like state which happen to me when underslept underfed and when the dopamine floods. /n /n 08:00 I wrote a story of an life changing experience I had one year ago, /n that I always wanted to get down on paper to a texting friend on the net. /n I am reminded by a person on the net to sleep now, and take the advice /n before I enter zombie-state. I have forgotten to eat properly. /n Water as needed. Sleepy time now. /n /n 10:00 No sleepy time yet, getting up now and then turning rolling in bed. /n /n 13:00 I take a shower and do some business downtown. ADHD-confusion made worse by tiredness, noisy - crowded - ugly movement - aura of stress. /n /n 14:00 I take my adhd-medication Modiodal [modafinil] 100mg. /n /n 15:00 Now I am trying to sleep again, being pissed off so taking 2mg xanax, 20mg valium and 15mg zolpidem. but alas no sleep. I realized I should not have taken the Modiodal which actualy now is waking me up. /n /n 20:00 I spend the rest of the evening playing online game and beeing buzzed /n on valium coffee and xanax, and wondering if a lower dosage of MDPV /n yields lower duration than 18 hours. /n /n ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ /n SUMMARY OF MY PERSONAL TRIAL /n /n Positives: very slow comedown /n no redosing-urge /n no euphoria /n mellow stimulation /n none to minor pupil dilation depending on dosage. /n Negatives: jaw-tension /n wiggling lizards tounge /n anorectic /n double vision on high dosage/going long time /n Neutral: Kept me awake for extremely long time. /n Had many different long plateaus of varying effects /n duration: 18 hours total including ultra slow comedown. /n Combination: 10mg Lexapro (SSRI) /n Tolerance-build: To find out /n /n ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ /n POSSIBLE USES I THOUGHT OF AFTER FIRST TRIAL /n /n Medicational uses: /n * If taken in early morning in low dosage could potentialy be trialed for surrogate adhd-medication for emergency or very occasional energizer. /n * I strongly would disagree trying to take this DAILY as surrogate adhd-medication or energizer because finding a correct dosing that doesn't build tolerance I suspect would be very troublesome and also given the generally accepted FIENDISHNESS which I however did not experience. Not to mention reaching a steady state with eye-balling or even a scale with 1-2mg diff would be impossible. /n /n Best usages in my opinion: /n /n * I strongly would like try a whole day at a carnival, hanging out with friends talking philosophical or rubbish topics would be proper, festival, or just relaxing a sunny day in the park would be nice. /n * A creative tool for a fine day of painting or writing or whatever artform. The plateaus of different effects make it both a peculiar and entertaining unreliable source for varying unexpectedness in creative outbursts! AND DO NOT BRING A BAG TO AVOID REDOSING.
